---
title: Cancel virtual cards
---

# Cancel virtual cards

Cancel virtual cards with the API.
Consent isn't required to cancel cards.

:::caution cancellation is irreversible
Canceling a virtual card is an **irreversible action** that immediately and permanently invalidates the card.
All physical and digital cards associated to the virtual card are also canceled.

Learn more about [virtual card cancellation](./index.mdx#cancel) on the virtual cards homepage.
:::

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `cancelCard` mutation.
1. Add the virtual `cardId` for the card you're canceling (line 2).
1. Add the success payload, including any information you'd like to review (line 3).
1. Add rejections (not shown).

## Mutation {#mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {2-3} showLineNumbers
mutation CancelVirtualCard {
  cancelCard(input: { cardId: "$YOUR_CARD_ID" }) {
    ... on CancelCardSuccessPayload {
      __typename
      card {
        statusInfo {
          status
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

The payload confirms that the virtual card is `Canceled`.

```json {7} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "cancelCard": {
      "__typename": "CancelCardSuccessPayload",
      "card": {
        "statusInfo": {
          "status": "Canceled"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
